description: N.A. Ramani Vs. K. Saman Nagarathne - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J before  Appellate power is given to the s.C. to canvass a decision under section 14(2) of the Maintenance Act No.37 of 1999.
parties: N.A. Ramani Vs. K. Saman Nagarathne - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J
judgement_by: Appellate power is given to the s.C. to canvass a decision under section 14(2) of the Maintenance Act No.37 of 1999.
